snippet.title: XDefiant - Official GSK Faction Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description: XDefiant is a free-to-play first-person multiplayer shooter developed by Ubisoft. Season 1 brings a brand-new faction to the game with the GSK Faction from Rainbow Six. The RSK Faction can deploy electrified barbed wire for area denial, counter enemy devices with their Active Defense System, and dazzle foes with their G52-Tactical Shield. The GSK Faction for XDefiant releases with Season 1 on July 2 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC.
